answers.answer: There are no doctors on the Ask a Doctor forum nor on this patient-2-patient forum.If you're seeking information on the various pancreas insulin blood test they are;1. Insulin test - To diagnose or evaluate low blood sugar (hypoglycemia).2. C-Peptide - C-peptide can be used to help determine how much insulin the patient’s pancreas is still producing.3. Anti-insulin antibodies (GAD-65) - This test may be performed if you have, or are at risk for type 1 diabetes. It also may be done if you appear to have an allergic response to insulin, or if insulin no longer seems to control your type 2 diabetes.Never heard of an ultrasound being used to test for diabetes.
